title: Canada 's biodiesel production 2007 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in million liters, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2012 to 2007.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2016.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2012.
gold: This statistic shows the annual production of biodiesel in Canada from 2007 to 2017 , with an estimated figure for 2018 , and a forecast for 2019 . The Canadian biodiesel production volume increased from 70 million liters in 2007 , to 397 million liters in 2017 . It is forecast that Canada 's production of biodiesel in 2019 will be 375 million liters .
